mapper.insert: INSERT INTO proposal ( prop_no, mem_id, prop_id, prop_date, prop_title, prop_content, prop_del_yn, prop_status ) VALUES ( prop_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memId}, #{propId}, #{propDate}, #{propTitle}, #{propContent}, #{propDelYn}, #{propStatus} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.prop_no AS propNo, p.prop_id AS propId, p.prop_date AS propDate, p.prop_title AS propTitle, p.prop_content AS propContent, p.prop_del_yn AS propDelYn, p.prop_status AS propStatus, p.mem_id AS memId, p.answercontent AS answerContent, m.mem_name AS memName FROM proposal p JOIN members m ON p.mem_id = m.mem_id ORDER BY p.prop_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE proposal SET ANSWERCONTENT = #{answerContent}, ANSWERDATE = SYSDATE, ANSWEREDBY = #{answeredBy}, PROPSTATUS = '답변완료' WHERE prop_no = #{propNo}
mapper.select: SELECT answer_content AS answerContent, answer_date AS answerDate, answered_by AS answeredBy FROM proposal WHERE prop_no = #{propNo}
